original_title: The Long Way Home: A Bigfoot Story
overview: This thriller, a Best Narrative Feature winner at the New York International Film Festival, takes viewers into the wilds of the Appalachian Mountains with D.J. Galloway (James "Bubba" Cromer), a down-on-his-luck journalist on the hunt for Bigfoot. Hoping a big story will come out of it to propel him back up the ladder of success, Galloway instead finds a way back to himself. So what's behind the sightings? It's a true discovery when he finds out.
title: The Long Way Home: A Bigfoot Story
